title: Is Cyberpunk 2077 an Xbox exclusive? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, as far as I know it will be released across all platforms. It's actually been delayed due to performance issues running on Xbox interestingly enough.
No, Cyberpunk 2077 is going to be releasing on PS4, Xbox One, Google Stadia, and Microsoft Windows on April 16th of this year.
